description: Assesses collateral risk, focusing on valuation, lien status, control, and its impact on loan classification, based on Comptroller's Handbook guidelines.

parameters.name: guideline_collateral_definition_general
parameters.description: General definition and purpose of collateral.
parameters.defaultValue: Asset pledged to lender, lender has right to take possession on default. Perfection via legal documents (security interest, mortgage).

parameters.name: guideline_collateral_valuation_methods
parameters.description: Guideline on methods for collateral valuation.
parameters.defaultValue: Valuation under duress (fair market, orderly liquidation, forced liquidation). Costs of repossession/holding/selling diminish proceeds.

parameters.name: guideline_collateral_perfection_control
parameters.description: Guideline on lien perfection and control over collateral.
parameters.defaultValue: Lender's rights must be perfected. Control over collateral is key.

parameters.name: guideline_collateral_dependent_classification
parameters.defaultValue: If borrower can't repay as structured, loan is collateral-dependent. Portion covered by conservatively valued collateral: Substandard. Remainder: Doubtful or Loss.

parameters.name: collateral_description_str
parameters.description: Description of the pledged collateral (type, quantity, condition).

parameters.name: collateral_valuation_type_basis_str
parameters.description: Basis of valuation (e.g., 'Appraisal - Fair Market Value', 'Forced Liquidation Estimate').

parameters.name: collateral_valuation_date_str
parameters.description: Date of the latest collateral valuation.

parameters.name: lien_status_control_str
parameters.description: Description of lien status (e.g., 'Perfected first lien') and lender's control.

parameters.name: is_borrower_collateral_dependent_bool
parameters.description: Boolean indicating if the borrower is currently considered collateral-dependent.
